mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fan_cards (membership_id, card_number, card_design_url, is_active) VALUES (#{membershipId}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardDesignUrl}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT membership_id FROM memberships WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status IN ('ACTIVE', 'CANCELLED') ORDER BY CASE status WHEN 'ACTIVE' THEN 1 WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, membership_id DESC

SELECT i.influencer_id, i.influencer_name, i.category, i.profile_image, i.fancard_image, i.is_verified FROM influencers i JOIN memberships m ON i.influencer_id = m.influencer_id WHERE m.membership_id = #{membershipId}

SELECT m.membership_id, m.subscription_start, m.monthly_amount, m.total_paid_amount, m.status, m.auto_renewal, mg.grade_id, mg.grade_name, mg.color, mg.benefits_description FROM memberships m JOIN membership_grades mg ON m.grade_id = mg.grade_id WHERE m.membership_id = #{membershipId}
SELECT i.influencer_name FROM influencers i JOIN memberships m ON i.influencer_id = m.influencer_id WHERE m.membership_id = #{membershipId}

( -- 해당 인플루언서의 멤버십 결제 이력 (구독 + 해지 모두 포함) SELECT p.payment_id, CASE WHEN p.status = 'CANCELLED' THEN CONCAT(i.influencer_name, ' 멤버십 해지') ELSE CONCAT(i.influencer_name, ' 멤버십 구독') END as title, p.amount, COALESCE(p.paid_at, p.cancelled_at, p.created_at) as paid_at, p.status, p.payment_method, CASE WHEN p.status = 'CANCELLED' THEN CONCAT('등급: ', mg.grade_name, ' 해지') ELSE CONCAT('등급: ', mg.grade_name) END as description, CASE WHEN p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID') THEN true ELSE false END as bold FROM payments p JOIN memberships m ON p.membership_id = m.membership_id JOIN influencers i ON m.influencer_id = i.influencer_id LEFT JOIN membership_grades mg ON m.grade_id = mg.grade_id JOIN memberships target_m ON target_m.membership_id = #{membershipId} WHERE p.payment_type = 'MEMBERSHIP' AND p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID', 'CANCELLED') -- 해지 상태도 포함 AND i.influencer_id = target_m.influencer_id AND m.user_id = target_m.user_id ) UNION ALL ( -- 해당 인플루언서의 팬미팅 예약 결제 이력만 SELECT p.payment_id, CONCAT(i.influencer_name, ' 팬미팅 예약') as title, p.amount, COALESCE(p.paid_at, p.cancelled_at, p.created_at) as paid_at, p.status, p.payment_method, CONCAT('팬미팅: ', fm.title) as description, CASE WHEN p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID') THEN true ELSE false END as bold FROM payments p JOIN fan_meeting_reservations fmr ON p.reservation_id = fmr.reservation_id JOIN fan_meetings fm ON fmr.meeting_id = fm.meeting_id JOIN influencers i ON fm.influencer_id = i.influencer_id JOIN memberships target_m ON target_m.membership_id = #{membershipId} WHERE p.payment_type IN ('ORDER', 'MEETING') AND p.reservation_id IS NOT NULL AND p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID') AND i.influencer_id = target_m.influencer_id AND p.user_id = target_m.user_id ) UNION ALL ( -- 해당 인플루언서의 상품 주문 결제 이력만 (일반 상품 + 공동구매 구분) SELECT p.payment_id, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM order_items oi2 JOIN products pr2 ON oi2.product_id = pr2.product_id WHERE oi2.order_id = o.order_id AND pr2.group_buy_price IS NOT NULL AND pr2.group_buy_price > 0 AND oi2.unit_price = pr2.group_buy_price ) THEN CONCAT(i.influencer_name, ' 공동구매') ELSE CONCAT(i.influencer_name, ' 상품 구매') END as title, p.amount, COALESCE(p.paid_at, p.cancelled_at, p.created_at) as paid_at, p.status, p.payment_method, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM order_items oi2 JOIN products pr2 ON oi2.product_id = pr2.product_id WHERE oi2.order_id = o.order_id AND pr2.group_buy_price IS NOT NULL AND pr2.group_buy_price > 0 AND oi2.unit_price = pr2.group_buy_price ) THEN '공동구매 상품' ELSE '마켓 상품 구매' END as description, CASE WHEN p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID') THEN true ELSE false END as bold FROM payments p JOIN orders o ON p.order_id = o.order_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN influencers i ON oi.influencer_id = i.influencer_id JOIN memberships target_m ON target_m.membership_id = #{membershipId} WHERE p.payment_type = 'ORDER' AND p.reservation_id IS NULL AND p.status IN ('APPROVED', 'PAID') AND i.influencer_id = target_m.influencer_id AND p.user_id = target_m.user_id GROUP BY p.payment_id, i.influencer_name, p.amount, p.paid_at, p.status, p.payment_method, o.order_id ) ORDER BY paid_at DESC LIMIT 20
